content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Monday, April 21, 2025 

Today is a “C” Day 

 

  • The International Club is meeting right after school on Wednesday, April 23. We will prepare for an event and the end of the year activities. 

 

  •  The Student Voices event will be happening this Thursday at 6pm at Lake Ave Elementary. Come and check out club displays, school projects, hear from a student panel, and visit community organizations. Free ice cream will be served. 

 

 

 *Today’s lunch pizza crunchers, steamed broccoli, fresh veggies and  

Scooby Doo Grahams  

 

 Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND! 

 

As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
